name: Vacuum (Zerptin)
description:
starting with nothing, try and gather enough energy to create the universe (2.3*10^79). As you gather more energy, the vacuum will get hotter and more chaotic.

Made for ludum dare 45 (start with nothing) in a couple of hours.

WASD controls.

Blue particles raise energy, Red ones lower it, the goal is to get as much energy as possible.
